page.title: 19Clubs and Societies
page.content: There are lots of things going on in our village. This week(July) a new youth club was opened on the Town Croft.You have to be 12 years old to join. Other things for chilren include cubs,boy-scouts,brownies and dancing classes.We also have after school clubs for gymnastics,chess,country dancing,music and computers. For grown ups there is a drama group and the Hartfield Singers.There is also the horticultural society,the red cross,womens institute,good companions British Legion, and church clubs. We have many sporting clubs, cricket football,croquet and tennis. As we are in the Ashdown Forest there are opportunities for horse riding and walking. There are many forms of wild life around.The village hall is used for dancing , concerts and meetings.
